remarks: Rule used to change the second bound variable in an ordered pair abstraction, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Sep-1999.)
statement:
cbvopab2v.1 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvopab2v $p |- { <. x , y >. | ph } = { <. x , z >. | ps } $.
$d ph z $.
$d ps y $.
$d x y z $.
